articles.description: The charity sale was held by Christie's auction house on Wednesday and saw 25 in-demand movie props and memorabilia made available to commemorate the 60th anniversary of James Bond.
articles.content: James Bond movie memorabilia fetched a total of more than £6million at a London charity auction celebrating sixty years of the popular franchise, with 007's Aston Martin DB5 selling for nearly £3mill… [+14291 chars]

articles.content: But in other areas, it falls short, with no art galleries, dance companies or opera houses at least not any that carry any great significance beyond the North West. The citys greatest receiving house… [+2822 chars]
